show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Guest: James Baird, Ph.D. <!--more--> Dr Baird has more than forty years of experience as a successful inventor and graduate engineer.
A pioneer in the new science of ultrasonics, Baird has earned several patents and founded Dynasonics, Inc.
, a design and manufacturing company of ultrasonic sensors and computers.
His passion for understanding the bioengineering that makes us human, combined with his religious and spiritual beliefs has led him to research the subject of happiness for more than 20 years.
His theory is based upon the premise that happiness comes from altruistic ethics and behavioral choices that put into action loving-kindness and compassion.
Dr Baird is chairman of the Chicago chapter of the American Scientific Association.
The organization’s mission is to bring harmony to science and religion.
On today’s show Dr Baird will discuss his latest book, Happiness Genes: Unlock the Positive Potential Hidden in Your DNA.
Contact: http://happinessgenes.com
